EmailTemplate.subject: Win the safari of a lifetime to Africa with Safari365
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ENTER OUR 10 YEAR ANNIVERSARY GIVEAWAY
Dear {!Account.FirstName},
In celebration of a decade of creating unforgettable African travel memories, Safari365 is giving away an incredible 10-day safari valued at more than USD 10,000.
How to enter:
Simply select your ideal African destinations and experiences, and refer one or more friends that might be interested in having their safari dreams come true. Friends will receive an introduction email and the option to unsubscribe should they so wish.
You will be automatically entered into the draw, where you and your partner stand a chance to win the safari of a lifetime to Africa.
~ Winners will be announced on 21 November 2016 ~
The Prize - A 10-Day African safari for two persons inclusive the following:
3 nights at the luxurious More Quarters Hotel in Cape Town.
A 15 minute helicopter flip over Cape Town.
1 night in the spectacular Cape Winelands.
3 nights on safari at Simbavati River Lodge in Kruger National Park.
2 nights at Victoria Falls at Ilala Lodge (including a sunset river cruise and
tour of the falls).
All internal flights and 4 days of car hire in Cape Town.
or

Good luck from all of us at Safari365!
